I don't personally use ~/dotfiles-local as my directory. I use:

~/src/github.com/croaky/dotfiles
~/src/github.com/thoughtbot/dotfiles

https://robots.thoughtbot.com/manage-team-and-personal-dotfiles-together-with-rcm
